de.bitbrain.braingdx.audio

Interface AudioManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioManagerImpl

    public interface AudioManager
    Provides a variety of audio controls such as spawning audio, fading between audio etc.
    Since:
    0.2.5
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all audio.
      void clearMusic()
      Clears all music and removes all related objects from the GameWorld.
      void clearSounds()
      Clears all sounds and removed all related objects from the GameWorld.

    • Method Detail

      • spawnSound

        void spawnSound(String path,
              float x,
              float y,
              float pitch,
              float volume,
              float hearingRange)
        plays a sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnSoundLooped

        void spawnSoundLooped(String path,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    float pitch,
                    float volume,
                    float hearingRange)
        Spawns a Sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera. The sound object is removed as soon the sound has stopped playing.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnSoundLooped

        void spawnSoundLooped(String path,
                    GameObject target,
                    float pitch,
                    float volume,
                    float hearingRange)
        Spawns a Sound in the GameWorld relative to the GameCamera. The sound object is removed as soon the sound has stopped playing.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        target - the target to attach the sound to
        pitch - the audio pitch
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • spawnMusic

        void spawnMusic(String path,
              float x,
              float y,
              float volume,
              float hearingRange)
        Spawns a Music in the world. The music persists until it is deleted via clearMusic.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the audio file
        x - the horizontal position in the world
        y - the vertical position in the world
        volume - the audio volume. FinalVolume=MasterVolume*volume*directionalVolume
        hearingRange - the hearing range where the audio is hearable from

      • clearMusic

        void clearMusic()
        Clears all music and removes all related objects from the GameWorld.

      • clearSounds

        void clearSounds()
        Clears all sounds and removed all related objects from the GameWorld.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all audio.

      • setMasterVolume

        void setMasterVolume(float volume)
        Sets a new master volume. Master volume is by default set to 1.0
        Parameters:
        volume - the master volume

      • crossFadeMusic

        void crossFadeMusic(String fromPath,
                  String toPath)
        Fades music from one music to another
        Parameters:
        fromPath - the source audio
        toPath - the target audio

      • crossFadeMusic

        void crossFadeMusic(String fromPath,
                  String toPath,
                  float duration)
        Fades music from one music to another
        Parameters:
        fromPath - the source audio
        toPath - the target audio
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • crossFadeMusic

        void crossFadeMusic(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music from,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music to,
                  float duration)
        Fades music from one music to another
        Parameters:
        fromPath - the source Music
        toPath - the target Music
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • fadeOutMusic

        void fadeOutMusic(String path)
        Fades out music
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the music file

      • fadeOutMusic

        void fadeOutMusic(String path,
                float duration)
        Fades out music
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the music file
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • fadeOutMusic

        void fadeOutMusic(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music music,
                float duration)
        Fades out music
        Parameters:
        path - the Music to fade out.
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • fadeInMusic

        void fadeInMusic(String path)
        Fades in music
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the music file

               float duration)
        Fades in music
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the music file
        duration - the duration in seconds

               float duration)
        Fades in music
        Parameters:
        path - the Music to fade in.
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • playMusic

        void playMusic(String path)
        Plays a given music.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the audio file

      • stopMusic

        void stopMusic(String path)
        Stops given music.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the audio file

        Pauses given music.
        Parameters:
